title: Little complain for Lil' Devil Teemo
body: Why doesn't he have a devlish sound filter? For a 1350 RP skin, he deserves a sound filter different from his original...

replies.body: Because his base skin voice IS the voice of the devil. His new skin is just him ripping off his flimsy yordle disguise and revealing his true form.

It might just be because it's early. Radiant Wukong got unique ability sounds that they didn't add for a while. Underworld Wukong was using the same sounds for the longest time as well before it got released. might be the same scenario.
It's almost like it's not ready to be released yet.

^ This

It's day 1 on the PBE guys, calm down!

That's it exactly. We really won't know what the final product will be till maybe a week before it gets released (which could still get changes in that time frame). Still, good to mention this stuff incase Riot didn't think about it. Gives them enough time to read the comments and add it before it's released. Like they did with Armor of the 5th age {{champion:44}}.
reaper soraka have it why not him?
And PROJECT: Leona.
All the PROJECT's have the new VO style
i think it makes his recall voice scarier because hes cute and fluffy until then
I would accept the skin price increasing for this.
I don't think it would have to skins like Program Soraka are 1350 and have voice filters. 8)

^ This.  Perfect skin otherwise.  Hell, it wouldn't even have to be on EVERY line.  It's creepier if he's all cute  and normal most of the time with just the reverb on occasion... like he does in his recall during his laugh.
Perhaps make it so that every time you laugh, or he makes a sound bite happen for whatever  reason (ex: moving), make there be a 1% chance. So it's 'really' out of nowhere.

Or just have him automatically do the high-pitched teemo laugh that turns demonic after getting a kill?  Kinda like how Singed laughs every time he flings you.  Nothing would tilt people harder than getting teemo ambushed and hearing the chortle of our dark lord and master as they slowly died to shroom poison.
that makes me think he'll end up with a lot of lines like that, since his skin animations and sounds are all ready but the voice pack probably isn't.
At least a little bit! Would make the skin perfect.
I totally agree
Agreed, I don't understand why riots been recently releasing 1350 skins yet they seem like 975's
I personally would like to keep his original voice as well, so he would randomly switch between vanilla demonic and filtered demonic lines.

It would be hilarious if they kept part of the original lines and altered them so that Teemo's ''true nature'' comes out at random bits.

Never underestimate the **LORD OF DARKNESS**!

Ha Ha **HA**!

Hut two three four five **SIX SIX SIX**!

Armed and ready **TO SEND THEM TO THE DEEPEST PITS OF HELL**!

Morgana didn't even get any special lines on her skin...
Possible they just weren't in todays update, but it would be very disappointing if there were just none other than her base ones.

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=h9AMFfha,comment-id=000a,timestamp=2016-10-05T03:12:55.478+0000)
>
> Morgana didn't even get any special lines on her skin...
> Possible they just weren't in todays update, but it would be very disappointing if there were just none other than her base ones.

1350 skins don't ever get new vocals unless it's a very special case.
Really, I'd be happy if they just reversed all his VOs.
I really wanted the Pentagram mushroom explosion
Because teemo's voice is already the devil. It didn't need any changing.
Um, because giving teemo a stereotypical "demonic" voice over would detract from the sheer evil of the champion...duh...
Are you kidding? NOTHING could detract from the sheer evil of Teemo... NOTHING.
For a 1350 RP skin, it's a disappointment.... I mean, it's just a different model with new VFX and SFX just like Bewitching Morgana/Tristana, all of them have special recall animations...
When will the skin release ? Will it become available with all the others Harrowing as soon the Harrowing starts ?

{{champion:17}} {{summoner:14}} {{item:3151}} when is the he coming out in NA live servers I'm waiting......?
its already patch 6.21 but no skin wtf

He needs his sound filter to not affect his laugh initially, but it becomes more pronounced each time he laughs in succession.

Oh, and better shrooms. A dark orb with a face isn't good enough.

When they release the new GM _Legend of the Demon King_  _: Little Devil Teemo's Doom Bots of Doom_ he'll have an update to his voice as a "treat" for the insidiously soul sucking, calamitously  vile, unpropitiously obscene, nefarious "tricks" he will impart on our souls during, The Harrowing.  
{{champion:17}} mmmmuuuuuaaahahHAHAHAHHAHAAAAAAAAAAAAA{{summoner:14}}

He doesn't need a filter, because the entire point of the skin is the play on his cute looks/voice versus the Satanic reality that hides beneath that facade. The recall is his standard giggle that degrades into hellish laughter. You lose that bit of silliness if he always has the filter. Additionally, he's got tons of new sound effects, such as the little spirit moans every time he shoots, and the ethereal scream every time he enters his passive stealth.
How _evil_

It's really early in the reveal, I think they might add a creepy voice before release.

Hail Teemo!
Personally, I wanted his to be an Ultimate Skin. But hey, we got what we wanted TBH.

He needs voice over lines plz add them or I will not
Buy this skin
